settings.settingsDescription: Manage your account preferences and settings
settings.orderUpdatesDescription: Get notified about order status changes
settings.marketingEmailsDescription: Receive promotional offers and product updates
settings.orderAlertsDescription: Receive SMS notifications for important updates
settings.showEmailDescription: Allow others to see your email address
settings.showPhoneDescription: Allow others to see your phone number
settings.enable2FADescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.loginAlertsDescription: Get notified when someone logs into your account
settings.accountDeletionRequested: Account deletion requested. This would typically require additional verification.
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
settings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

footer.aboutDescription: AdsMarket is your premier destination for discovering and purchasing amazing products through our affiliate marketplace.
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to get updates on new products and exclusive offers.

search.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or browse our categories

home.welcomeDescription: Your premier destination for discovering amazing products from trusted brands worldwide. Find the best deals, exclusive offers, and quality products all in one place.
home.trendingSubtitle: What's hot and popular right now
home.loadingDescription: Discovering the best deals for you

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.messageSentDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about AdsMarket
faq.noResultsDescription: Try searching with different keywords or browse all FAQ categories.
faq.cantFindAnswer: Can't find what you're looking for? We're here to help!

help.title: Help Center
help.description: Find answers to common questions and get support
help.howToBrowseDesc: Use our search bar or browse categories to find products you're interested in.
help.howToQuickViewDesc: Click the "Quick View" button on any product to see detailed information without leaving the page.
help.howToTrackDesc: All products you view or click on are automatically saved in your "Visited Items" section.
help.wherePricesFrom: Where do product prices come from?
help.wherePricesFromDesc: Our product prices are sourced from affiliate partners and updated regularly.
help.howAccurateDesc: We strive to keep all product information accurate and up-to-date.
help.canSeeReviewsDesc: Product ratings and reviews are displayed on each product card and in Quick View.
help.websiteNotLoadingDesc: Try refreshing your browser or clearing your cache. If the problem persists, contact us.
help.imagesNotDisplayingDesc: Check your internet connection. Product images are loaded from external sources.
help.quickViewNotWorkingDesc: Make sure JavaScript is enabled in your browser. Try refreshing the page.
help.cantFindAnswer: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your information
privacy.yourPrivacyDesc: We are committed to protecting your personal information and respecting your privacy.
privacy.secureDataDesc: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
privacy.transparencyDesc: We believe in being transparent about how we collect and use your information.
personalInfoList: Name and contact information (when you contact us)
Shipping and billing addresses (when making purchases through affiliate links)
Payment information (processed securely by our affiliate partners)
usageInfoList: Products you view and interact with
technicalInfoList: Browser cookies and local storage data
privacy.serviceProvisionDesc: To provide and maintain our affiliate marketplace services, including product recommendations and affiliate link tracking.
privacy.userExperienceDesc: To personalize your experience, remember your preferences, and improve our website functionality.
privacy.analyticsDesc: To analyze usage patterns, track performance metrics, and improve our services.
privacy.communicationDesc: To respond to your inquiries, provide customer support, and send important service updates.
privacy.legalComplianceDesc: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes.
privacy.localStorageDesc: Visited items and preferences are stored locally on your device using browser storage. This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.
privacy.secureTransmissionDesc: All data transmission between your device and our servers is encrypted using SSL/TLS protocols.
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.accessControlsDesc: Access to your personal information is restricted to authorized personnel who need it to provide our services.
privacy.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for basic website functionality, including session management and security features.
privacy.functionalCookiesDesc: Remember your preferences and settings to improve your user experience.
privacy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve performance.
privacy.affiliateTrackingDesc: Track affiliate link clicks and purchases to maintain our affiliate partnerships.
privacy.cookieManagementDesc: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
privacy.affiliatePartnersDesc: We work with trusted affiliate partners. When you click on affiliate links, you may be redirected to their websites, which have their own privacy policies.
privacy.analyticsServicesDesc: We may use third-party analytics services to understand website usage and improve our services.
privacy.paymentProcessorsDesc: Payment information is processed by secure third-party payment processors when you make purchases through affiliate links.
privacy.accessDataDesc: Request access to the personal information we have about you.
privacy.correctInformationDesc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information.
privacy.deleteDataDesc: Request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal and operational requirements.
privacy.dataPortabilityDesc: Request a copy of your data in a portable format.
privacy.optOutDesc: Opt out of certain data collection and processing activities.
privacy.localStorageControlDesc: Clear your browser's local storage to remove visited items and preferences.
privacy.childrensPrivacyDesc: Our services are not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacy.internationalTransfersDesc: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this privacy policy.
privacy.changesToPolicyDesc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
privacy.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using AdsMarket
terms.clearTermsDesc: Simple and transparent terms for using our platform
terms.fairUseDesc: Terms designed to protect both users and our platform
terms.userProtectionDesc: Your rights and responsibilities clearly outlined
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using AdsMarket ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.affiliateMarketplaceDesc: AdsMarket is an affiliate product marketplace that connects users with products from various retailers and brands through affiliate partnerships.
terms.userPlatformDesc: We provide a platform for users to discover, compare, and access products through affiliate links to external retailers.
terms.dataManagementDesc: We track user interactions for analytics purposes and provide local storage for visited items and preferences.
terms.accurateInformationDesc: Provide accurate and truthful information when contacting us or using our services.
terms.lawfulUseDesc: Use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service.
terms.respectfulBehaviorDesc: Conduct yourself in a respectful manner when using our platform and contacting customer service.
terms.accountSecurityDesc: Maintain the security of any account information and be responsible for all activities under your account.
terms.complianceDesc: Comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and third-party terms when using our service.
terms.illegalActivitiesDesc: Using the Service for any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts.
terms.violationsDesc: Violating any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances.
terms.intellectualPropertyDesc: Infringing upon or violating our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others.
terms.harassmentDesc: Harassing, abusing, insulting, harming, defaming, slandering, disparaging, intimidating, or discriminating.
terms.falseInformationDesc: Providing false or misleading information or impersonating another person or entity.
terms.systemInterferenceDesc: Attempting to interfere with, compromise the system integrity or security, or decipher any transmissions.
terms.thirdPartyWebsitesDesc: Our Service contains links to third-party websites that are not owned or controlled by AdsMarket. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites.
terms.affiliatePartnershipsDesc: We maintain affiliate partnerships with various retailers and brands. When you click on affiliate links, you may be redirected to external websites with their own terms and conditions.
terms.userResponsibilityDesc: You acknowledge and agree that AdsMarket shall not be responsible or liable for any damage or loss caused by your use of any third-party website or service.
terms.productInformationDesc: Product information, prices, and availability are provided by our affiliate partners and may change without notice. We strive for accuracy but cannot guarantee the correctness of all information.
terms.ourContentDesc: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of AdsMarket and its licensors.
terms.userContentDesc: You retain ownership of any content you submit, but grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content in connection with the Service.
terms.trademarksDesc: The AdsMarket name, logo, and related trademarks are owned by us and may not be used without our prior written consent.
terms.thirdPartyContentDesc: Product images, descriptions, and other content from affiliate partners remain the property of their respective owners.
terms.dataCollectionDesc: We collect and use information as described in our Privacy Policy. By using our Service, you consent to such collection and use.
terms.localStorageDesc: We use local browser storage to save your visited items and preferences. You can clear this data at any time through your browser settings.
terms.analyticsDesc: We may use analytics tools to understand how users interact with our Service and improve our offerings.
terms.dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information, but cannot guarantee absolute security.
terms.uptimeDesc: We strive to maintain high service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access to the Service.
terms.maintenanceDesc: We may temporarily suspend the Service for maintenance, updates, or improvements with or without notice.
terms.forceMajeureDesc: We are not liable for any failure to perform due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control.
terms.serviceAsIsDesc: The Service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis without warranties of any kind.
terms.productAccuracyDesc: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of product information provided by affiliate partners.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityDesc: In no event shall AdsMarket be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
terms.thirdPartyActionsDesc: We are not responsible for the actions, content, or services of third-party websites or services.
terms.userTerminationDesc: You may stop using the Service at any time by discontinuing access to our website.
terms.serviceTerminationDesc: We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason.
terms.effectOfTerminationDesc: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately, and we may delete your data.
terms.survivalDesc: Certain provisions of these Terms will survive termination, including intellectual property rights and limitations of liability.
terms.governingLawDesc: These Terms of Service shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the State of New York, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the courts of New York.
terms.changesToTermsDesc: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the Service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.severabilityDesc: If any provision of these Terms of Service is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
terms.contactInformationDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.description: Everything you need to know about shipping and delivery
shipping.partnerNotice: All shipping and delivery services are provided by our trusted partner companies. Delivery times, policies, and procedures are subject to our partners' terms and conditions.
shipping.fastReliableDesc: We work with trusted shipping partners to ensure your orders arrive safely and on time.
shipping.expressDeliveryDesc: Many products offer same-day or next-day delivery options in select areas.
shipping.securePackagingDesc: All items are carefully packaged to prevent damage during transit.
shipping.domesticDeliveryDesc: We deliver to all 50 states in the United States, including Alaska and Hawaii.
shipping.internationalShippingDesc: Limited international shipping available to select countries. Contact us for availability and rates.
shipping.orderConfirmationDesc: You'll receive an email confirmation with your order details and estimated delivery date.
shipping.processingDesc: Your order is prepared and packaged by our fulfillment team.
shipping.shippedDesc: You'll receive a tracking number and can monitor your package's progress.
shipping.deliveredDesc: Your package arrives at the specified delivery address.
shipping.amazonLogisticsDesc: For products fulfilled by Amazon, delivery times and policies follow Amazon's standard procedures.
shipping.fedexDesc: Express and standard shipping services provided by FedEx with their terms and conditions.
shipping.upsDesc: Ground and air shipping services with UPS delivery standards and policies.
shipping.dhlDesc: International and domestic express shipping with DHL's delivery commitments.
shipping.processingTimeDesc: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. During peak seasons, processing may take up to 3 business days.
shipping.deliveryTimeframesDesc: Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on weather conditions, shipping carrier delays, or other factors beyond our control.
shipping.addressChangesDesc: Address changes must be made within 2 hours of order placement. Contact customer service for assistance.
shipping.undeliverablePackagesDesc: Packages that cannot be delivered will be returned to us. Additional shipping charges may apply for redelivery.
shipping.holidayShippingDesc: During holiday periods, shipping times may be extended. We recommend placing orders early to ensure timely delivery.
shipping.weatherDelaysDesc: Severe weather conditions may cause shipping delays. We work with carriers to minimize impact on delivery times.
shipping.signatureRequiredDesc: Some high-value items require a signature upon delivery. Make sure someone is available to receive the package.
shipping.shippingQuestions: Have questions about your order or need assistance with shipping options?

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.description: Our hassle-free return and exchange policy
returns.easyReturnsDesc: 30-day return window for most items in original condition
returns.quickProcessingDesc: Returns processed within 3-5 business days of receipt
returns.fullRefundsDesc: Complete refund to original payment method
returns.thirtyDayWindowDesc: You have 30 days from the delivery date to initiate a return for most items.
returns.originalConditionRequiredDesc: Items must be in original condition with tags, packaging, and accessories included.
returns.freeReturnShippingDesc: We provide prepaid return labels for eligible returns.
returns.fullRefundGuaranteeDesc: Receive a complete refund to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
returns.initiateReturnDesc: Log into your account and select "Return Item" from your order history, or contact customer service.
returns.getReturnLabelDesc: We'll email you a prepaid return shipping label within 24 hours of your return request.
returns.packageItemDesc: Securely package the item in its original packaging with all accessories and documentation.
returns.shipReturnDesc: Drop off the package at any authorized shipping location using the provided label.
returns.receiveRefundDesc: Once we receive and process your return, you'll get your refund within 5-7 business days.
returns.sizeExchangesDesc: Exchange for a different size within 30 days. Free return shipping and free shipping for the new item.
returns.colorExchangesDesc: Exchange for a different color or style of the same item. Subject to availability.
returns.defectiveItemsDesc: Items with manufacturing defects can be exchanged or refunded at no cost to you.
returns.personalizedItemsDesc: Custom-made or personalized products cannot be returned unless defective.
returns.digitalProductsDesc: Digital downloads, software, and electronic media are non-returnable.
returns.usedOrDamagedDesc: Items that show signs of use or damage beyond normal wear cannot be returned.
returns.finalSaleItemsDesc: Items marked as "Final Sale" or "No Returns" cannot be returned or exchanged.
prepaidReturnLabelsList: Free return shipping for eligible returns
Labels valid for 30 days from issue date
Drop off at any authorized location
returnPackagingList: Attach return label to outside of package
returns.returnReceivedDesc: We process returns within 1-2 business days of receipt.
returns.qualityCheckDesc: Items are inspected to ensure they meet return criteria.
returns.refundProcessedDesc: Refund is issued to your original payment method.
returns.refundReceivedDesc: You should see the refund in your account within 5-7 business days.
returns.returnQuestions: Questions about our return policy or need assistance with a return?

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies on AdsMarket
cookies.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.
cookies.yourPrivacyDesc: We respect your privacy and give you control over cookie preferences.
cookies.easyManagementDesc: You can easily manage and control cookies through your browser settings.
cookies.whatAreCookiesSectionDesc: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
cookies.whatAreCookiesSectionDesc2: Cookies contain information that is transferred to your computer's hard drive. They help us to improve our site and to deliver a better and more personalized service.
cookies.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation, access to secure areas, and remembering your preferences during your visit.
cookies.functionalCookiesDesc: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
cookies.analyticsCookiesDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our website's performance and user experience.
cookies.affiliateTrackingCookiesDesc: These cookies track your interactions with affiliate links and help us maintain our affiliate partnerships. They are essential for tracking purchases and ensuring proper commission attribution.
cookies.localStorageDesc: In addition to cookies, we use local storage technologies to enhance your experience on our website:
cookies.localStorageItemDesc: We use browser local storage to save your visited items and preferences. This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers unless you contact our support team.
cookies.sessionStorageDesc: We use session storage to temporarily store information about your current browsing session, such as recently viewed products and navigation history.
cookies.thirdPartyCookiesDesc: Some cookies on our website are set by third-party services that we use to enhance functionality and analyze usage:
cookies.analyticsServicesDesc: We may use third-party analytics services to understand how our website is used. These services may set their own cookies to track your activity across websites.
cookies.affiliatePartnersDesc: When you click on affiliate links, our partners may set cookies to track your visit and any subsequent purchases. These cookies are governed by our partners' privacy policies.
cookies.socialMediaDesc: If you interact with social media features on our website, those platforms may set cookies to track your activity and provide personalized content.
cookies.managingCookiesDesc: You have several options for managing cookies on our website:
cookies.browserSettingsDesc: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can choose to:
browserSettingsList: Delete cookies when you close your browser
Manage cookies on a site-by-site basis
cookies.localStorageManagementDesc: You can clear your browser's local storage at any time through your browser's developer tools or settings. This will remove all visited items and preferences stored on your device.
cookies.optOutToolsDesc: You can use browser extensions or opt-out tools provided by third-party services to manage tracking cookies and analytics.
cookies.googleChromeDesc: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
cookies.mozillaFirefoxDesc: Options → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
cookies.microsoftEdgeDesc: Settings → Cookies and site permissions → Cookies and site data
cookies.impactOfDisablingDesc: If you choose to disable cookies, please note that some features of our website may not function properly:
cookies.essentialFeaturesDesc: Disabling essential cookies may prevent the website from functioning properly, including navigation and security features.
cookies.personalizationDesc: Without functional cookies, we cannot remember your preferences or save your visited items locally.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Disabling analytics cookies means we cannot improve our website based on usage data, but this won't affect your ability to use the site.
cookies.affiliateLinksDesc: Disabling affiliate tracking cookies may affect our ability to maintain partnerships and provide accurate product information.
cookies.cookieRetentionDesc: Different types of cookies have different retention periods:
cookies.sessionCookiesDesc: These cookies are deleted when you close your browser and are only stored temporarily.
cookies.persistentCookiesDesc: These cookies remain on your device for a set period, typically between 30 days and 2 years, depending on their purpose.
cookies.localStorageRetentionDesc: Data stored in your browser's local storage remains until you clear it manually or your browser's storage limit is reached.
cookies.updatesToPolicyDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
cookies.updatesToPolicyDesc2: We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us:

affiliateLinks.title: Visited Items
affiliateLinks.description: View and manage your visited items. These items are saved locally on your device when you click Quick View or Buy Now.
